doc.field: Ribot's personal website features a biography, discography, information about Ribot's different projects, tour dates, film work, merchandise, audio recordings of his music, and press mentions. His projects include his solo work, Marc Ribot's Ceramic Dog, Songs of Resistance, Marc Ribot Quartet, Grimes/Ribot/Taylor Trio, The Young Philadelphians, Marc Ribot y Los Cubanos Postizos, David Hidalgo & Marc Ribot, Buddy Miller & Marc Ribot, Charlie Chaplin's "The Kid", Shadows Choose Their Horrors, Aelita: Queen of Mars, The Docks of New York, Flm Noir Project, Caged Funk, Scelsi Morning, and Frantz Casseus.
Robots.txt (a piece of code designed to limit crawler activity within a website) was ignored.
Websites were rescoped to include Soundcloud, Bandcamp, YouTube, and Vimeo.

Due to technical or privacy issues, archived websites may not be exact copies of the original website at the time of the web crawl. Certain file types will not be captured dependent on how they are embedded in the site. Other parts of websites that the crawler has difficulty capturing includes Javascript, streaming content, database-driven content, and highly interactive content. Full-Text searches of archived websites are available at https://archive-it.org/organizations/567.
